data.title: The God Of Mars by Edgar Rice Burroughs: Very Good Hardcover (1920)
data.meta_description: Hardcover - Methuen, London - 1920 - Condition: Very Good - Good - Extremely scarce in d/j, this is the first 'cheap' edition of The Gods Of Mars, first published on 19th February of the same year. In VG order throughout. Pages uniformly browned, commensurate with age and paper stock, in clean red boards with black titling with very light edge wear and just a touch of fading to top and bottom of spine. D/j a little more worn, with slight loss to top of spine. 234pp + 8 pages of ads - The God Of Mars
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Happy to refund in full if book is not as you expected and

returned in 30 days. Dodman Books is a trading name of Morston Marketing Ltd (company reg no.4602436/ VAT no. GB805348143). We can be contacted using the address above or by calling Robert Metcalfe on 07947 761942.

Shipping Terms:

Orders are individually wrapped and usually despatched in cardboard book mailers within 3 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required. We use Royal Mail for most orders, but for heavier parcels may use Collect+ or similar courier services. If you would like expedited shipping, or a particular courier or service, please let us know.
